name: template-package-dev
description: Docker compose setup for dev environment

scripts.dev: saf-docker generate && docker compose --env-file env.dev --env-file .env -f docker-compose.yaml --build up
scripts.up: saf-docker generate && docker compose --env-file env.dev --env-file .env -f docker-compose.yaml up --build --detach
scripts.down: saf-docker generate && docker compose --env-file env.dev --env-file .env -f docker-compose.yaml down
